tool_description: Validates communication channel configurations and contact information to ensure deliverability and compliance.

channel_type.description: Communication channel to validate: email, sms, push, postal

contact_value.description: The contact information to validate (email address, phone number, etc.)

error_messages: Unsupported channel type: channel_type must be one of: email, sms, push, postal.
Invalid contact format: The contact_value format is invalid for the specified channel_type.
Validation service unavailable: External validation service is temporarily unavailable. Try again later.
Invalid validation level: validation_level must be one of: basic, standard, strict.
usage: Specify the channel_type and contact_value to validate. Use validation_level to control how strictly the validation is performed.

is_valid.description: Whether the contact information is valid

validation_score.description: Confidence score from 0-100 for the validation result

deliverability.description: Estimated deliverability: high, medium, low, unknown

issues.description: List of identified issues with the contact information
